author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM ERIN FORMS JUST WEST OF THE CABO VERDE ISLANDS...
summary: ...TROPICAL STORM ERIN FORMS JUST WEST OF THE CABO VERDE ISLANDS... As of 2:00 PM CVT Mon Aug 11 the center of Erin was located near 17.4, -28.0 with movement W at 20 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...TROPICAL STORM ERIN FORMS JUST WEST OF THE CABO VERDE ISLANDS... As of 2:00 PM CVT Mon Aug 11 the center of Erin was located near 17.4, -28.0 with movement W at 20 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Erin (AT5/AL052025)
